articles.content:

articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.title: Microsoft announces new Teams features as usage skyrockets nearly 40 percent in a week - The Verge
articles.description: Microsoft is revealing new Teams features for its chat app as many turn to the service to work remotely. Microsoft Teams daily active users have jumped to 44 million, and Microsoft is bringing noise suppression and offline support to the app later this year.
articles.content:
Microsoft Teams now has 44 million daily active users
Microsoft is revealing new Teams features today to mark three years of the service just as it experiences unprecedented growth amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. Teams suffered an outage on Monday as … [+2662 chars]

articles.title: Gabe Newell says brain-computer interfaces will be an "extinction-level event" for entertainment - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: In a rare interview, Gabe Newell has said he’s been spending “a lot of time” looking into brain-computer interfaces.
articles.content: In a rare interview, Gabe Newell has said he’s been spending “a lot of time” looking into brain-computer interfaces. “The Matrix is a lot closer than people think”, he says, and it’s going to be “an extinction-level event for every entertainment form that’s n… [+2017 chars]
